body:
Well New England Patriots vs Atlanta Falcons. Who you got?

As I live in Georgia and ABSOLUTELY HATE NEW ENGLAND I'm pulling for Atlanta.

I am also a Steelers fan so I just wanna say for those of you who watched it THEY SUCKED THEY CANT EVEN DO ZONE COVERAGE LEAVING HOGAN WIDE OPEN.

replies.body:
Bills fan here, disappointing season for us..

Atlanta's offense is basically unstoppable, but their defence is what they would lose on. 
But i think, if Patriots would win it's because of Atlanta's defence. 

My pick is, 27-23 to Atlanta.
